CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 10, 1956, pg. A32, reads: "Platters Visit Walt - When the Platters were at the Copa, Downtown Pittsburgh, last week, they took time out to visit Walt Harper, the Pittsburgh bandleader, and helped him celebrate his first anniversary on Station WHOD. The Platters presented their latest recording, 'Magic Touch,' to Walt, who has the biggest jazz show in Pittsburgh. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: The Platters, possibly including Herb Reed, Tony Williams, David Lynch, Paul Robi, and Zola Taylor, with Walt Harper on right, in WHOD radio station studio
